item.description:
Hey everyone, The Best Weekend of Your Life is officially sold out! If you missed this weekend, but would like to check out the club another time, please contact us! For those of you who are coming up, can't wait to kick off the season white trash style! And if you haven't yet, don't forget to pay via paypal for dinner.

See you up there!
Krissie and Dan


The Brettl-Hupfers will be at our lodge the weekend of December 10th to welcome new guests for a weekend of skiing & riding. Discount tickets will be available for only $25 to Bretton Woods on Saturday followed by an event at the lodge and an optional catered dinner.

We are about 2 miles from Attitash and close to Wildcat, Cranmore, and Black Mountain.

Come up and join us for the weekend. First time guests are welcome for a reduced rate of only $10 per night guest fee (half price!). Once you RSVP full directions and information will follow.

Members and guests must be 21+
item.name: The Best Weekend of Your Life - SOLD OUT
